meanings: (글·글씨 등을) write, (시·편지 등을) compose, (적다) put[write] (sth) down, (간단히) jot sth down

vlive.korean: 자기 나이를 댓글로 써줄 수 있나요? Can you write your age in the comments? 듣기 View video BTOB : 팬싸인회 가는길😢

examples.korean: He wants to know if we can give her a recommendation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 우리가 그녀의 추천서를 써줄 수 있는지 알고 싶대요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Some fans send me great letters.Although I can't always answer them all, I do try to read as many of their letters as possible. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 어떤 팬들은 멋진 편지들을 보내주기도 하는데, 다 답장을 써줄 수는 없지만 다 읽으려고는 노력하고 있어요. TIMES CORE
examples.english: Some fans send me great letters.Although I can't always answer them all, I do try to read as many of their letters as possible. Add to Wordbook
